member.summary: Users must have a verified email on their account.

member.summary: Users must fulfill the requirements of Low, and be registered on Discord for at least 5 minutes.

member.name: F:Discord.VerificationLevel.High

member.name: F:Discord.VerificationLevel.Extreme
member.summary: Users must fulfill the requirements of High, and must have a verified phone on their Discord account.

member.name: T:Discord.GuildUserProperties
member.summary: Modify an IGuildUser with the following parameters.

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.Mute
member.summary: Should the user be guild-muted in a voice channel?
member.remarks: If this value is set to true, no user will be able to hear this user speak in the guild.

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.Deaf
member.summary: Should the user be guild-deafened in a voice channel?
member.remarks: If this value is set to true, this user will not be able to hear anyone speak in the guild.

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.Nickname
member.summary: Should the user have a nickname set?
member.remarks: To clear the user's nickname, this value can be set to null.

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.Roles
member.summary: What roles should the user have?
member.remarks: To add a role to a user: To remove a role from a user:

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.RoleIds
member.summary: What roles should the user have?
member.remarks: To add a role to a user: To remove a role from a user:

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.Channel
member.summary: Move a user to a voice channel.
member.remarks: This user MUST already be in a Voice Channel for this to work.

member.name: P:Discord.GuildUserProperties.ChannelId
member.summary: Move a user to a voice channel.
member.remarks: This user MUST already be in a Voice Channel for this to work.

member.name: P:Discord.RequestOptions.Timeout
member.summary: The max time, in milliseconds, to wait for this request to complete. If null, a request will not time out. If a rate limit has been triggered for this request's bucket and will not be unpaused in time, this request will fail immediately.

member.name: P:Discord.RequestOptions.AuditLogReason
member.summary: The reason for this action in the guild's audit log

member.name: T:Discord.RetryMode
member.summary: Specifies how a request should act in the case of an error.

member.name: F:Discord.RetryMode.AlwaysFail
member.summary: If a request fails, an exception is thrown immediately.

member.name: F:Discord.RetryMode.RetryTimeouts
member.summary: Retry if a request timed out.

member.name: F:Discord.RetryMode.RetryRatelimit
member.summary: Retry if a request failed due to a ratelimit.

member.name: F:Discord.RetryMode.Retry502
member.summary: Retry if a request failed due to an HTTP error 502.

member.name: F:Discord.RetryMode.AlwaysRetry
member.summary: Continuously retry a request until it times out, its cancel token is triggered, or the server responds with a non-502 error.

member.name: T:Discord.Cacheable`2
member.summary: Contains an entity that may be cached.
member.typeparam: The type of entity that is cached
The type of this entity's ID

member.name: P:Discord.Cacheable`2.HasValue
member.summary: Is this entity cached?

member.name: P:Discord.Cacheable`2.Id
member.summary: The ID of this entity.

member.name: P:Discord.Cacheable`2.Value
member.summary: The entity, if it could be pulled from cache.
member.remarks: This value is not guaranteed to be set; in cases where the entity cannot be pulled from cache, it is null.

member.name: M:Discord.Cacheable`2.DownloadAsync
member.summary: Downloads this entity to cache.
member.returns: An awaitable Task containing the downloaded entity.
member.exception: Thrown when used from a user account.
Thrown when the message is deleted.

member.name: M:Discord.Cacheable`2.GetOrDownloadAsync
member.summary: Returns the cached entity if it exists; otherwise downloads it.
member.returns: An awaitable Task containing a cached or downloaded entity.
member.exception: Thrown when used from a user account.
Thrown when the message is deleted and is not in cache.
